userdoc.notice: The purpose of this contract is to hold ZKUSD tokens for gas compensation: When a borrower opens a trove, an additional 50 ZKUSD debt is issued, and 50 ZKUSD is minted and sent to this contract. When a borrower closes their active trove, this gas compensation is refunded: 50 ZKUSD is burned from the this contract's balance, and the corresponding 50 ZKUSD debt on the trove is cancelled. See this issue for more context: https://github.com/liquity/dev/issues/186
